item.title: Honey ricotta turnovers
item.description: Ingredients 3/4 cup whole-milk ricotta 3 tablespoons sugar 1/4 teaspoon pure vanilla extract 1 teaspoon lemon or orange zest (optional) 1 large egg Coarse salt 1/4 cup ( 1/2 stick) unsalted butter 2 tablespoons honey, plus more for serving 6 sheets frozen phyllo dough, thawed Instructions Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, combine ricotta, sugar, vanilla, zest (if using), egg, and pinch of salt. Mix well to combine.
